sentences.sContent: ...Mark is the best candidate for chairman of the student union...
...Those who had watched Obama's acceptance speech as the Democrats' presidential candidate performed just as well...
...why you are the best candidate for a certain position...

phrases.pCn: 合格的候选人；合资格人员

remMethod.val: can(能) ＋ did(做) ＋ ate → 能做实事的人才能当候选人 → 候选人

words.tran: [法] 候选人资格；候选人的地位（等于candidacy）

trans.tranCn: 候选人， 投考者， 申请求职者
trans.tranOther: someone who is being considered for a job or is competing in an election
